title: Does CIE have credits? Is it beneficial ?

comments.body:
it consists of 2 levels, each worth 2 credits.  
 as for the latter question, that differs from person to person

I took up both level 1 and level 2.
U learn nothing technical but learn a lot about entrepreneurship.
If that's what u want, then sort it.
I feel mini project is more worth it
Will CIE add more value for placements or a moinor in cs?

Minor in cs.
Cie doesn't help one bit in placement until u create a real startup
